entity.name: Hillary Clinton
entity.description: Former First Lady of the United States Hillary Clinton

text: @HillaryClinton The coronavirus, scientists working directly with it tell me, is fairly easy to kill on surfaces.  The disinfectants/ sanitizers do work.  The hard part is neutralizing it in people.
